Text: Updated Bisti Motor Conf CallWhen Wednesday March AM AM GMT Central Time US Canada Where ECN passcode Arnold Eisenstein only

RE Gas Pipeline Station Waste Heat Recovery Cc Station on TW is about miles east of Kingman Arizona and is within ft of a kv and a kv power line and substation My understanding is that the High voltage line goes to Ca The unit is an LM iso rated at HP and site rated at somewhere about at deg F Original Message From Hank Leibowitz ENRON mailtoHank Leibowitz ENRON Sent Mon PM To Eisenstein Arnold L Cc Subject Gas Pipeline Station Waste Heat Recovery Arnold Really enjoyed meeting you last week When I got back to the office today I was informed that the CA Power Authority has issued us an LOI for a power purchase agreement of up to MW for a WHRS project using gas pipeline station waste heat The PPA is quite viable In the info given to me last year by Chris Hilgert I noticed that TW Station is very close to a transmission line Does this line go into CA If so can we discuss using the LM waste heat Ormat can either build ourself or let you Please let me know ASAP I need to get back to the PA Thanks Hank Leibowitz Manager Heat Recovery Systems
